data.title: Larry Wood's New Book, 'The Earth Project' is an Entertaining Book That Chronicles Earth's First Starship Commander's Adventures and Misadventures.
data.meta_description: Recent release "The Earth Project" from Covenant Books author Larry Wood is a thrilling story about Captain Dave Dawson, the first starship commander of Earth who is well-versed with the cosmos that is teeming with life and accompanies a beautiful Orion woman in a space mission of searching for a rogue planet, finding out that beings and things are not what they have appeared to be.
data.text:
Larry Wood, a retired member of the New York Army National Guard who loves painting and science fiction, has completed his new book, “The Earth Project”: an enjoyable book on Captain Dawson’s plan to save people and the galaxy itself upon his discovery of Earth’s true history, the terrifying truth that has been held secret from mankind, and the ongoing alien abductions as well as genetic manipulation.

Published by Covenant Books of Murrells Inlet, South Carolina, Larry Wood’s new book is a commendable work of fiction about Captain Dave Dawson’s journey on saving mankind and the galaxy from a vile race that has conquered Earth, has killed and enslaved the first colonists of the planet, and has prepared to expand their influence.

The Captain has a role to play in the plan to save Earth from a dark, cold race of beings who operate from the shadows. He learns about portals, vortexes, wormholes, and who has been controlling the planet along the way.

Readers can purchase “The Earth Project” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, or Barnes and Noble.

Covenant Books is an international Christian owned and operated publishing house based in Murrells Inlet, South Carolina. Covenant Books specializes in all genres of work which appeal to the Christian market. For additional information or media inquiries, contact Covenant Books at 843-507-8373.

Source: Covenant Books
